returnType: The SYSTIMESTAMP function returns a TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE value.
description: The Oracle/PLSQL SYSTIMESTAMP function returns the current system date and time (including fractional seconds and time zone) on your local database.
sample:
SELECT SYSTIMESTAMP
INTO v_time
FROM dual; 2015-07-22 10:35:07.417849 -06:00 SELECT TO_CHAR(SYSTIMESTAMP, 'SSSS.FF')
FROM dual; 4141.550774 SELECT supplier_id, SYSTIMESTAMP
FROM suppliers
WHERE supplier_id > 5000;
